pages.name: Premier Research Labs (PRL) Client Testimonials
pages.business_description: Premier Research Labs provides unadulterated, high-quality nutritional supplements manufactured in the USA using excipient-free processes and sustainably sourced ingredients.
pages.transformation: Revitalizes lives and enhances overall vitality through premier quality and innovative formulas for holistic wellness.
pages.audience_served: Health care practitioners, their clients and patients, and general consumers.
pages.invitation_swipe_copy:
SPECIAL INVITATION: Share Your Story with Premier Research Labs  
CC: Director@Share.one  

We are thrilled to invite you to participate in a special virtual video interview with Premier Research Labs. Your unique experience with our scientifically-backed, high-quality supplements is invaluable and can inspire other practitioners seeking to enhance their clients' health. By sharing your story, you can help others discover the transformative power of our meticulously sourced, excipient-free products.  

Would you be open to sharing your experience and story through a short video interview with one of my producers?  

It will just take 20 minutes of your time and all you have to do is book a recording time with this calendar link: https://my.share.one/PRL-2024101012  

Can I lean on you for this?  

If you are a NO let us know that too!  

Thank you so much!

story_formula_questions.question_text: So, take me back to before you found PRL—what was going on with your health? What kind of things were you dealing with that made you feel like you needed a change?
story_formula_questions.follow_up_text: Was there a specific 'aha' moment when you realized you couldn't just keep going the way you were?

story_formula_questions.question_text: I'm curious, how were those struggles actually affecting your day-to-day life? Like, back then, what was a typical day like for you when you weren't feeling your best?
story_formula_questions.follow_up_text: Did it keep you from doing things you love or just make it harder to get through the work day?

story_formula_questions.question_text: With so many supplements out there, what was it about PRL that made you think, 'Hey, I should give this a try'?
story_formula_questions.follow_up_text: Was it a recommendation from your practitioner, or did something about their clean, 'pure' approach really resonate with you?

story_formula_questions.question_text: Tell me about when you started taking the products—maybe it was the Curcumin-FX or the Glucose Manager—what was that experience like for you at the beginning?
story_formula_questions.follow_up_text: Did you notice anything right away, or was it more of a gradual 'hey, I feel better' kind of thing?

story_formula_questions.question_text: So, how are things looking now? If you had to describe your energy or your overall vibe these days compared to before, what's changed for you?
story_formula_questions.follow_up_text: Is there something you can do now easily that used to feel like a total chore?

story_formula_questions.question_text: It’s so great to hear you're feeling revitalized! How does it feel knowing that what you’re putting in your body is totally clean and sustainably sourced?
story_formula_questions.follow_up_text: Does that give you a bit more peace of mind compared to other brands you've tried in the past?

story_formula_questions.question_text: If you were chatting with a friend who was going through exactly what you went through, what would you want to tell them about your journey with PRL?
story_formula_questions.follow_up_text: What’s the one thing you really want them to know about why it’s worth making the switch?
